name: shy-firefox-86
author: Na3ar-17
description: shy-firefox-86 组件 (simple, icon, animation, button, interactive)

original.html:
<button class="button">
  <svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" height="24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" aria-hidden="true" class="icon">
    <path d="M5 12h14m-7 7V5" stroke-width="2" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-linecap="round" stroke="currentColor"></path>
  </svg>

  Create Task
</button>

uniapp.template:
<button class="button"></button>
  <view viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" height="24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" aria-hidden="true" class="icon"></view>
    <path d="M5 12h14m-7 7V5" stroke-width="2" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-linecap="round" stroke="currentColor"></path>
  </svg>

  Create Task
</button>
